targetIds.description: A list with the IDs of the targets to scan. The target ID can designate an endpoint or a container.

customScanSettings.description: Object containing information such as scan depth and scan path(s). This object should be set only when type parameter has the value 4 (Custom Scan).

scanDepth.description: The scan depth for the custom scan.

scanPaths.description: A list of paths to scan.

returnAllTaskIds.description: If set to true, the method will return all task IDs created by the scan. If set to false, it will return only the first task ID.

description: Create a new custom task scan
name: Create a new custom task scan

result.description: This method returns the ID of the newly created task or a boolean value which is true if the creation of the task was successful.
